attributes.action: Compel any young people aged 16 -21 to undertake community work if not in education or work if they want to receive state handouts
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This would hopefully encourage the awareness of responsibilities as opposed to rights & help to redress some of the damage caused to communities by feckless wastes of space. They would need to prove an active desire to contribute to society if they want society to contribute towards their new trainers & satellite tv packages.

government_responses.details:
You recently signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "Compel any young people aged 16 -21 to undertake community work if not in education or work if they want to receive state handouts."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.number-10.gov.uk/output/Page11520.asp

Prime Minister's Office
